description: Type of accommodation (capsule, room, or house)

value: Welcome to Pelangi Capsule Hostel! Enjoy private sleeping pods with fresh linens, personal light, and power socket. Shared bathrooms are cleaned multiple times daily. Quiet hours are from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM. Reception is available from 8:00 AMâ€“10:00 PM; night staff is on call.
26A, Jalan Perang, Taman Pelangi, 80400 Johor Bahru, Johor, Malaysia\nPhone: +60 12-345 6789\nEmail: info@pelangicapsule.com

Check-In Time: 2:00 PM
Check-Out Time: 12:00 PM

How to check in:
1) Present a valid ID/passport at the front desk.
2) If you have a self-check-in token, show it to staff.
3) Early check-in / late check-out may be available upon request.

House Rules:
- No smoking inside the building.
- Keep noise to a minimum, especially during quiet hours.
- Food is allowed in the pantry only.

Amenities:
- Free high-speed Wiâ€‘Fi throughout the hostel.
- Pantry with kettle, microwave, and fridge (label your items).
- Laundry service (self-service machines on Level 2).

Q: What time are check-in/check-out?
A: Check-in 2:00 PM, Check-out 12:00 PM.

Q: Where can I store luggage?
A: Free luggage storage at reception before check-in or after check-out.

Q: Are towels provided?
A: Yes, one towel per guest per stay.

Q: Do you have parking?
A: Limited street parking nearby; public car park is 3 minutes walk.
